title-part.text: DOMESTIC STOVES OR RANGES FOR SOLID FUELS

CPC-specific-text.text: on which a removable cooking element is arranged

reference.text: F24B1/08, F24B1/14 take precedence

title-part.text: Construction of tiles and bracing means therefor, e.g. shim liner

reference.text: forming of tiles B28B; glazing of tiles C04B

title-part.text: with fuel storage in a single undivided hopper within stove or range

reference.text: F24B1/14 takes precedence

title-part.text: with fuel storage in multiple or divided hoppers within the stove or range
Stoves with open fires, e.g. fireplaces

CPC-specific-text.text: adapted for the use of both solid fuel and another type of fuel or energy supply

reference.text: for stoves F24C1/02

CPC-specific-text.text: Mounting of closed stoves in a fireplace

title-part.text: Free-standing fireplaces, e.g. for mobile homes;

reference.text: other stoves with additional provisions for cooking F24B1/26

title-part.text: with additional provisions for heating water
with air-handling means, heat exchange means, or additional provisions for convection heating

reference.text: F24B1/183 takes precedence; component parts or accessories having air-handling means, heat exchange means, or additional provisions for convection heating F24B1/191

title-part.text: Condition responsive controls for regulating combustion

reference.text: valves or dampers for air supply F23L; regulating or controlling combustion F23N; controlling or regulating in general G05

title-part.text: characterised by use of heat exchange means,

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. using a particular heat exchange medium, e.g. oil, gas

reference.text: F24B1/187 takes precedence

CPC-specific-text.text: the heat exchange medium being either water or air
the heat exchange medium being both water and air
the heat exchange medium being air only
the heat exchanger comprising only tubular air ducts within the fire

title-part.text: characterised by air-handling means, i.e. of combustion-air, heated-air, or flue-gases, e.g. draught control dampers

reference.text: F24B1/187, F24B1/188 take precedence

CPC-specific-text.text: in combination with provisions for heating air only
in combination with provisions for heating water only
in combination with provisions for heating both air and water

reference.text: fire-screens A47G5/04, protective guards F24C15/36

title-part.text: in which the baking oven is arranged above the fire-box
with built-in masses for heat storage or heat insulation
Stoves with additional provisions for cooking

reference.text: stoves with open-fires with additional provisions for cooking F24B1/182

title-part.text: Combined installations of stoves or ranges, e.g. back-to-back stoves with a common fire-box
Heaters not covered by group F24B1/00, e.g. charcoal brazier

reference.text: for cooking A47J27/00 - A47J37/00

title-part.text: Combustion-air or flue-gas circulation in or around stoves or ranges

reference.text: stoves with open fires with air-handling means F24B1/185
regulating combustion F23N; air supply for combustion apparatus F23L

CPC-specific-text.text: Supply of primary air for combustion
Supply of secondary air for completing combustion of fuel
Supply of primary and secondary air for combustion
Arrangements combining combustion-air and flue-gas circulation

title-part.text: the air or gas passing downwards through the bottom of the stove of fire grate

CPC-specific-text.text: the oven in arranged under the fire-box

title-part.text: Stoves, ranges or flue-gas ducts, with additional provisions for convection heating

reference.text: stoves with open fires characterised by use of heat exchange means F24B1/185; air heaters having heat generating means F24H3/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Stoves or ranges with additional provisions for heating both air and water

title-part.text: Stoves, ranges or flue-gas ducts, with additional provisions for heating water

reference.text: F24B1/182, F24B1/183 take precedence

title-part.text: Details solely applicable to stoves or ranges burning solid fuels

reference.text: component parts or accessories for stoves with open-fires F24B1/191; removing ash, clinker or slag from combustion chambers F23J1/00; removing solid residues from passages or chambers beyond the fire F23J3/00; joints or connections for chimneys or flues F23J13/04; mouths or inlet holes for chimneys or flues F23J13/06; means for supervising combustion F23M11/04

CPC-specific-text.text: Doors specially adapted for stoves or ranges

reference.text: doors for open fires F24B1/192

CPC-specific-text.text: Arrangements for cleaning, e.g. soot removal; Ash removal

title-part.text: Arrangement or mountings of fire-grate assemblies

reference.text: grates F23H

title-part.text: Arrangement or mountings of linings for fire-boxes, e.g. fire-back

reference.text: ceramic materials C04B33/00, C04B35/00; casings, linings, walls for combustion chambers F23M

title-part.text: Arrangements for feeding solid fuel, e.g. hoppers

reference.text: feeding solid fuel to combustion apparatus in general F23K

title-part.text: Implements for use in connection with stoves or ranges

reference.text: ash sieves
B07B; fire lighters C10L11/00; removal of ashes F23J; other devices for igniting F23Q
bellows F04B45/02; gas pokers F23Q13/02
